name: DAOs and Governance: A Delegate's Perspective
description:
Abdullah Umar (Michigan Blockchain) & Getty Hill (GFX Labs).

Description: We will be discussing how DAOs are currently run, the pros and cons of current DAO structures (balance decentralization vs efficiency), and how voting + discussion making occurs between delegates + token holders

speakers.name: Abdullah Umar
speakers.bio: Abdullah is the co-president and head of governance at Michigan Blockchain, with delegations across Uniswap, Aave, Compound, Arbitrum, and others. He is also a co-founder of a crypto liquid venture fund called Arana, investing in low-cap public assets.

speakers.name: Getty Hill
speakers.bio: Getty Hill is the co-founder of GFX Labs, a software development and research company based in Chicago. GFX Labs launched Oku, the advanced trading interface for Uniswap v3, and has been heavily involved in the governance of Uniswap and other leading protocols.
